messages.message:
Hi team,
~when working with "custom functions" - is it possible to get a feature to be able to pass output of certain fields into the function as an argument?~
~for example -~
1.  ~i have a field called "bank statements" that extracts entire list of transactions~ 
2. ~I want to build a field using a udf that sums up all the transactions within the list~
~currently to do this, i have 2 options :~

1. ~duplicate the field, use udf as a cleaning function  -> Not desirable since if i have to change the prompt on the original field, ill have to do the same here~
2. ~(The approach I am using right now) create a derived field, reference the target field in the prompt as " return <derived field> as-is" and add a cleaning udf -> also not desirable since this depends on the mercy of the LLM to return the same format field without any explanations~ 
Edit:  completely missed the "add argument" button under the UDF field, please ignore this! thanks @Ananya for the help!
